posts.subject: A New Home in the Underworld
posts.body:
==The Last Bastion of Romance==

8chan has fallen, and with it, the last bastion of romance.

Until it returns - if it ever does, home is here.

==Board rules==
>Follow the Thread Theme, basically don't derail threads, the same goes for off topic dice rolls too.
>Check the catalog before making a thread, so the board wont get clogged up with duplicate threads.
>Hide, and unhost threads, posts and content you don't like, or that you think are illegal - do the best you can to self moderate.
>/monster/ is not a place for drama or a place to use as your personal blog.

>NO FURRY, KEMONO, or MLP. This means no snouts, or other animal faces. This violates the spirit of the board.
>NO ARGUING ABOUT HOW FURRY OR MLP SHOULD BE ACCEPTED EITHER.
>No NTR, scat, piss, guro, inflation, vore, or other heresy. It's generally not tolerated.
>No traps, trannies, shemales, futa, or other homosexuality, with the possible exception of yuri.
>No monsterboys.
==Otherwise, it is ok to post==

Monster Girl Resources:
http://monstergirlencyclopedia.wikia.com/wiki/Category:Mamono
http://monstergirlquest.wikia.com/wiki/MonsterGirlQuest_Wiki
http://touchfluffytail.org/ 
http://pastebin.com/UevqvF4h
http://tvtropes.org/pmwiki/pmwiki.php/Main/CuteMonsterGirl

posts.subject: Tailpussy thread, bunker edition.
posts.body:
==Get your MRE's and ammo hoard. The bombs have dropped, and you've just been forced to jump into a bunker with your manticore GF.==

>You've got fifteen years of supplies, including supplies for making and caring for babies, and your concrete fortress is both secure, well placed, and very well hidden. You have running water, and hydroelectric power from a nearby river, though you need to replace a charcoal filter from time-to time.
>Which GF would anon prefer to keep in his home?

<Clingy Cuddle Technocore.
>She's quite lazy, and is absolutely content to spend fifteen years doing very little, so long as she's with you.
>She is a major nerd who has made a hobby out of studying.
>She's not super potent in combat, but she will happily do idle tasks, and do them quite well - she is content to parent.
>She brings her entertainment systems, and a deep library of games, music, movies, shows, and data-hoards. These will keep children educated and entertained.
>She has contributed a massive fuel storage to the bunker to keep these systems running.
>She makes love slowly, and as often as possible.
>She's very needy and demands affection on a regular basis.
>Her body is slightly chubbier, and she burns food and supplies at roughly half the normal rate.

<Huntercore
>She's a farmer's daughter who was raised into a competent markswoman. She wants to get shit done and help put fresh food on the table.
>She will frequently leave the bunker to explore, forage, farm, and hunt. 
>She is equipped with a wide arsenal of weapons ranging from bows, to crossbows, Air rifles, pistols, light caliber rifles, intermediate caliber rifles, and big bore rifles, Pistol carbines, submachine guns, bolt action rifles, spare parts, optics, batteries, suppressors, etc.
>She can bring her reloading bench, and supplies with her on her flatbed truck, she can furnish fresh rounds of 5.56 NATO, .45 ACP, 9mm, .308, 7.62x39, .500 magnum, and .44 magnum.
>She has an ammo stash that is quite impressive. She also has a large stash of reloading supplies.
>She is competent in combat, and very unlikely to die, or become injured in encounters outside.
>She is also competent at protecting her children, who, over the age of 5, will be frequently brought out of the bunker with her to gain experience.
>She has a vast wealth of practical knowledge, and can tell many tales to keep children educated and entertained.
>She is quite independent, and compartmentalizes her time to keep love separate from work.
>She makes love with you usually three times a day, for roughly an hour each time; once in the morning, once after lunch, and once at night. She is usually quite intense, and she is passionate.
>You will likely see the sun more often with her, and will establish your presence more effectively after you leave the bunker.
>Her body is lithe and lean.

<Medicore
>She's a schooled and trained medical practitioner. She has highly marketable skills outside of the bunker, and will guarantee a rebound in quality of life once you start a new life.
>She has a bit of a neurotic personality, and spends a lot of time and effort worrying, and being careful, so that nobody will get hurt, lost, or taken advantage of.
>She might become unstable if she isn't reassured, and kept warm.
>She is equipped with a large kit of medical tools, and supplies, and the knowledge to use them.
>Other bunkerdwellers will often bring you supplies in exchange for her service as a doctor. Expect to see luxuries like fresh food, and new, or handmade clothing.
>She is not very fun, but she is very good at teaching children, because she can quickly, and accurately make a valid point.
>She is a bit of a strict parent. You had better keep the children entertained, or they might grow dull.
>When she makes love, which is usually twice daily, she is either very sweet and loving, or she will edge and torture you to be reassured of your sexual dependence on her.
>Once you start sex with her, she generally won't stop until she has to.


<Crafticore
>This manticore has made a living as a craftswoman. She has highly marketable skills outside of the bunker, many of which being immediately useful to your survival, and comfort in the wilderness.
>She has a wide variety of tools and machinery which she will bring to the bunker in her truck.
>She is competent in metalwork, metallurgy, clothwork, leatherwork, smithing, ceramics, woodwork, weaving, construction, etc.
>She is industrious, and spends long periods of time working, though if she's doing relatively idle tasks, like weaving, or leatherwork, she may request your company for sex or affection.
>She takes a lot of pride in her work, and finds it very pleasing to impress you. She will do her best to keep everyone clothed, problems solved, and conditions comfortable.
>She is practical and down-to-earth.
>She may need to conduct trade to acquire materials.
>Sex with her is usually a daily opportunistic series of quickies, and a nightly, slow, intense lovemaking.

>>384f2bca-ee2a-4007-b789-55eda200cc8c
That's interesting, the character limit of 5000 is not representative of the point where your post will actually be cut off.

<Medicore
>...
>When she makes love, which is usually twice daily, she is either very sweet and loving, or she will edge and torture you to reassure herself of your sexual dependence on her.
>Once you start sex with her, she is unlikely to stop until she has to.

<Crafticore
>She has spent much of her life making a living in the crafts. She has highly marketable skills outside of the bunker, many of which are extremely useful to your survival and comfort during your stay.
>She is competent in metalwork, metallurgy, clothwork, leatherwork, smithing, ceramics, woodwork, weaving, construction, etc.
>She has has a wide variety of tools, materials, and machinery which she will bring to the bunker in her truck.
>She is industrious, and spends large amounts of time working, but during relatively idle tasks, like leatherworking, or weaving, she may request your company for sex, or affection.
>She is down-to-earth and very practical. She will raise children who are quite normal and well-adjusted.
>She finds it very pleasing to impress you, and takes pride in ensuring everyone is clothed, problems are solved, and conditions are comfortable.
>She has high tolerance for misery and monotony. She is not lazy at all.
>She is creative and brilliant, she can and will fix broken technology.
>In order to maximize her productivity, she will often have to conduct in trade with other bunkerdwellers.
>Sex with her is usually a series of opportunistic quickies, and a long lovemaking session at the end of the night.

>>aa3f4669-a099-4977-a73f-4fcf25bf978d

Bird girls always a cute. 
>Lightweight and small, so you can toss them around, and carry them easily.
>Feathered wings for advanced hugs.
>Birdfeet for repelling footfags.
>Cute, autistic bird behavior.
What's not to love, anons?
Hey fags, does anyone know how I can dedicate a terabyte of data to upholding this site? Because I can, and will.

>>352b5fe1-bbc2-42c4-b977-8af2ff0ffa49
>>11e89835-a068-42c7-973a-613c0cd74a3c
Ok I figured out how to make room for my homeboard.

Click and drag the ZeroNet icon in the upper right corner. Drag it leftwards. This will open up an interface unique to the site - wherein you can change your site-specific file storage limit.

>>f532b35f-ff8f-4130-9a1e-8ae72a030b40

Asking for educational reasons.

>>b1834165-e405-4fa8-a071-1b4af0e53163
I suspect that when TORposting becomes functional again, all your broken posts that you've already made might suddenly become functional, so long as you didn't purge your Zeronet cache.

>>189de73a-b246-4e34-a347-eb400802b666
That's pretty embarrassing, but I don't think there's anything I can do to remove the thread - and I started the 08/monster/ board.

Besides ignoring the thread and trying anew, I don't really know how to help you. Maybe shedding TOR will allow you to seed your files? There's a test board for troubleshooting that you might want to post on first.

==EDIT: I can blacklist posts, though. I think I'll just blacklist your failed thread and allow you to try again. We'll see if everyone shares the blacklist.==
==SECOND EDIT: That means that I want you to report back to me about whether or not you can see your thread when blacklisting is enabled.==

>>cfa75b48-d0b9-4a9a-9e08-ed8f0235867a

But if you posted an image, no, I can't see any image.

>>e730b313-8a40-4336-ab60-caf06a4993af
/monster/ is a niche that will simply wash away under the tide of the roaming horde of mouthbreathing furfags.

If you break the rules, your post will be blacklisted. If you break the rules hard enough, your user data will be blacklisted. __All to preserve the culture of this board.__

==You have plenty of space to post heresy elsewhere.==

>>952df5d7-72d6-4b4b-ac4c-2e06172b2c5f
>Go on a shooting with a 1911.
>Shoot same man in the head 6 times.
>Cry as all 6, 230 gr, .45 calibre bullets deflect off of his skull, doing no lethal damage whatsoever.
>You flinch, and your 7th shot misses completely.
>reload
>Give up and go hunt other people.
>They all dodge your slow bullets.
>Reload.
>Your hand begins to ache from massive recoil.
>Fire at man through glass window.
>Bullets deflect off of glass, leaving copper-lead smear marks.
>Damn it you forgot to square yourself with the glass.
>reload.
>Fire at asian man.
>You can't hit his tiny body.
>He runs away into a cave.
>You feel thirteen pounds lighter already.
>reload.
"Hey nice 1911 you got there!" Says the cop.
"Thanks! It's a classic!" You reply.
>Realize you were just having a flashback to Vietnam.
>Cop inspects your CCWP.
"Have a nice day."
>Go home and clean the cop's greasy fingerprints off your beautiful sidearm.

>>f9af075f-7555-4274-91e6-282390f63244
BO, I think part of the solution is to allow "subscriptions" to moderators, or groups of moderators, who can create blacklists and mutelists at will, but also are simply optional. That way moderation can be done for free, but also doesn't become stifling and oppressive.

Imagine.

>picking your mods from a list.
>blacklisted post is still visible, but only barely - shoved off, out of the way, to the margins, shrunk down to almost nothing, and merged with consecutive blacklisted posts.
>Thumbnail is 50 pixels wide.
>Modmode, wherein blacklisting a post takes only one click, and it's easy.
>You can see which moderator snuffed what post.

Also 
>Content publish failed.
Can anyone read me?
